title: European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities 
(Minimum Conditions for Examining Agriculture Plant Species) (Amendment) 
Regulations 2022.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european community (minimum condition examining agriculture plant species) (amendment) regulation 2022

title: European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving
heading: 2. The European Communities (Minimum Conditions for Examining
text_raw:
2. The European Communities (Minimum Conditions for Examining 
Agriculture Plant Species) Regulations 2004 (S.I. No. 122 of 2004) are 
amended by substituting in Regulation 2 for the definition of “Directive” (as 
amended by the European Communities (Minimum Conditions for Examining 
Agriculture Plant Species) (Amendment) (No.2) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 
752 of 2021) the following- 

“‘Directive’ means Commission Directive No. 2003/90/EC of 6 October 
20032 as amended by Commission Implementing Directive (EU) 2022/905 of 9 
June 2022;”.
text_norm: 2 european community (minimum condition examining agriculture plant species) regulation 2004 (s.i no 122 2004) amended substituting regulation 2 definition directive (as amended european community (minimum condition examining agriculture plant species) (amendment) (no.2) regulation 2021 (s.i no 752 2021) following- directive mean commission directive no 2003 90 ec 6 october 20032 amended commission implementing directive (eu) 2022 905 9 june 2022

title: European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving
heading: 3. The European Communities (Minimum Conditions for Examining
text_raw:
3. The European Communities (Minimum Conditions for Examining 
Agriculture Plant Species) (Amendment) (No. 2) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 
752 of 2021) are revoked. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

22 November, 2022. 

CHARLIE MCCONALOGUE, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

1 O.J. No. L 157, 10.06.2022, p. 1 
2 O.J. No. L 254, 08.10.2003, p.7 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 25th November, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [594] 3

title: European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

These Regulations give effect to the provisions of Commission Implementing 
Directive (EU) 2022/905 of 9 June 2021 which amends Council Directive 
2003/90/EC on the protocols for the examination of certain varieties of 
Agriculture Plant Species. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [594]
